channel.title: windows on TOUNO.io
channel.description: Recent content in windows on TOUNO.io

item.title: ffmpeg enhance video
item.description: Windows 10 user installation ffmpeg from chocolatey. choco install ffmpeg # *.flv files convert to *.mp4 and scale to 480p for %a in (*.flv) do ffmpeg -y -i "%a" -vf scale=-1:480 -vcodec libx264 -b 400k -ac 2 -ar 44100 -ab 128k "%~na.mp4" # merge 2 files mp4 video without change fps video and audio. ffmpeg -i 10-A.mp4 -i 10-B.mp4 -filter_complex "[0:v:0] [0:a:0] [1:v:0] [1:a:0] concat=n=2:v=1:a=1 [v] [a]" -map "[v]" -map "[a]" output.
